                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
After a three-year assignment in the field FBI agent Henry Durand (Colin Hanks) 
returns home with his fiance (Selma Blair) only to find his once-dowdy over 
weight mother Martha has transformed into the highly attractive enlightened 
Marty (Meg Ryan) who dates every night of the week. When Marty meets the 
mysterious Tommy (Antonio Banderas) Henry is ordered to spy on his mother after 
learning Tommy may be involved in an international art theft ring.

Director: George Gallo

Writer  : George Gallo

Cast:

Antonio Banderas ...  Tommy 
Meg Ryan ...  Marty Durand 
Colin Hanks ...  Henry Durand 
Selma Blair ...  Emily
